info.title: APIs For Admin application
info.description: API endpoints for the admin application.

post.summary: Admin login and get Admin Data

422.description: Validation error or failure to send SMS

get.summary: Retrieve a single category by ID
Get comments of courses with pagination
Retrieve a single comment of course by ID

delete.summary: Delete a comment of course by ID

get.summary: Retrieve a single course by ID

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the course to update

422.description: Validation error or image not provided

get.summary: Get sections of courses with pagination
Retrieve a single section of course by ID

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the section course to update

delete.summary: Delete a section of course by ID

get.summary: Get sessions of courses with pagination

course_section_id.description: The ID of the section of course

file_url.description: The file url of the session(externall link like youtube or aparat video link)

duration_minutes.description: The duration of the associated course

get.summary: Retrieve a single session of course by ID

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the session course to update

course_section_id.description: The ID of the section of course

file_url.description: The file url of the session

duration_minutes.description: The duration of the associated course

delete.summary: Delete a session of course by ID

post.summary: Update or Insert an existing SessionCourse file

422.description: Validation error or image not provided

parameters.name: read
parameters.description: Filter notifications by read status (0 for unread, 1 for read)

user_id.description: The ID of the user to whom the notification belongs

read.description: Indicates whether the notification has been read or not

get.summary: Get a single notification by ID

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the notification to retrieve

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the notification to update

user_id.description: The ID of the user to whom the notification belongs

read.description: Indicates whether the notification has been read or not

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the notification to delete

get.summary: Retrieve a single course by ID

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the course to update

422.description: Validation error or image not provided

from.description: Index of the first item in the current page

path.description: URL path for the current page

to.description: Index of the last item in the current page

id.description: The unique identifier for the course.

hours.description: The number of hours for the course.

category_id.description: The ID of the category to which the course belongs.

description.description: A brief description of the course.

discount.description: The discount applied to the course.

session.description: The number of sessions for the course.

summary.description: A summary of the course content.

image.description: The image URL for the course.

SessionCourse.title: SessionCourse
SessionCourse.description: Schema for a session of a course

id.description: The unique identifier for the session

course_section_id.description: The ID of the course section

file_path.description: The file path of the session file

file_name.description: The file name of the session file

file_type.description: The file type of the session file

file_size.description: The file size of the session file in bytes

duration_minutes.description: The duration of the session in minutes

created_at.description: The datetime when the session was created

updated_at.description: The datetime when the session was last updated

CommentCourse.title: CommentCourse
CommentCourse.description: Schema for a comment of a course

id.description: The unique identifier for the session

show.description: show the comment(0 is hide ,1 is show)

id.description: The ID of the user who liked the comment

created_at.description: The datetime when the comment was created

updated_at.description: The datetime when the comment was last updated

id.description: The unique identifier for the notification

user_id.description: The ID of the user to whom the notification belongs

read.description: Indicates whether the notification has been read or not

created_at.description: The datetime when the notification was created

updated_at.description: The datetime when the notification was last updated

SectionCourse.title: SectionCourse
SectionCourse.description: Schema for a section of a course

id.description: The unique identifier for the section

discount.description: The discount applied to the course.

created_at.description: The datetime when the session was created

updated_at.description: The datetime when the session was last updated
